name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in full-cycle development and deployment within cloud environments, particularly in **Azure** and **AWS**. My technical proficiency includes **Python**, **Java**, **CI/CD** methodologies, and extensive knowledge of **API** development. I am well-versed in **Microservices** architecture and have hands-on experience with containerization technologies like **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Furthermore, I effectively leverage **Terraform** for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and utilize tools like **Databricks**, **Argo**, and **Airflow** for orchestration and automation in complex environments.

My background includes building high-performance solutions primarily in the healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing, ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. My commitment to automated testing and robust CI/CD pipelines results in secure, scalable applications that meet evolving business needs.
